name: Glenn Talbot
description: Major Glenn Talbot was member of United States Air Force, United States Army and Hulkbusters.

wiki.occupation: Colonel, US Air Force; former commanding officer of Gamma Base, security chief of Project: Greenskin and Los Alamos Missile Base ("Desert Base")
wiki.groups: US military; formerly US Air Force Mobile Combat Force One ([[Hulkbusters]]), Operation: Hulk
wiki.abilities: Glenn Talbot was highly trained in the US Air Force and was a competent military strategist.
wiki.paraphernalia: During his time in command of Gamma Base, he had extensive access to troops, vehicles and weapons. He once wore Super-Mandroid armor that granted him enhanced strength and durability as well as several energy cannons. He also piloted the War Wagon, a durable ship outfitted with complex artificial intelligence, sonic pulse emitters, electrical charges and various missiles and bombs.
wiki.bio_text: Colonel Glenn Talbot was member of United States Air Force, United States Army and [[Hulkbusters]]. He was also an enemy of the [[Hulk (Bruce Banner)|Hulk]] and was killed during a battle with him in Japan. After [[Ross, Thaddeus|General Ross]] died at the hands of the [[Red Hulk]], Talbot resurfaced with Ross' daughter, [[Ross-Banner, Betty|Betty]]. The mystery surrounding his resurrection has yet to be revealed, but Talbot is either working with or under the protection of the [[Intelligencia]].

The mystery surrounding his resurrection has yet to be revealed, but Talbot is either working with or under the protection of the [[Intelligencia]].
categories: People who used to be dead but aren't anymore
